channel.title: (lumonsity 474 loading 317) dialoguehandler.java help
channel.description:
server: lumonosity 474 revision: 474 but it looks like a 317. no items that are above 317 + i dont know if it is in actionhandler.java because i was searching through and i saw some senddialgue but i put mine in and it gaved me compiler errors. ok when i edit my dialgouehandler.java the npc wont talk to me!@#$% 1)i change case # 2)i change npc name 3)i change what the npc says 4)i change sendNpcChat1 to sendNpcChat4 and it still doesnt work. 5) i look around the server files and theirs no if (npcdialogue == 1) <-- some servers have this to make the npc talk, but i dont have it 6) there are npc in the dialogue already i change what they say and it works. I delete some because i have many and it still doesn't. 7) yes i do compile and run. no errors whatsoever 8) there is no other files in client.java there is nothing has to do with npcdialogue. [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/v31zbo.jpg[img] http://oi45.tinypic.com/v31zbo.jpg
plz comment, no negative, dont say "give more info" because this is alot of info"
[size=36pt]PLZ DONT POST NEGATIVE, OR WRONG SECTION IK IT IS![/size] [size=14pt]i needed help for 5 days aleready[/size]

item.title: (lumonsity 474 loading 317) dialoguehandler.java help
item.dc:creator: @F2p_Blackscape F2p Blackscape
item.description:
@F2p_Blackscape wrote:

server: lumonosity 474
revision: 474 but it looks like a 317. no items that are above 317 +
i dont know if it is in actionhandler.java because i was searching through and i saw some senddialgue but i put mine in
and it gaved me compiler errors.
ok when i edit my dialgouehandler.java the npc wont talk to me!@#$%
1)i change case #
2)i change npc name
3)i change what the npc says
4)i change sendNpcChat1 to sendNpcChat4 and it still doesnt work.
5) i look around the server files and theirs no if (npcdialogue == 1) <-- some servers have this to make the npc talk, but i dont have it
6) there are npc in the dialogue already i change what they say and it works. I delete some because i have many and it still doesn’t.
7) yes i do compile and run. no errors whatsoever
8) there is no other files in client.java there is nothing has to do with npcdialogue.

http://oi45.tinypic.com/v31zbo.jpg

plz comment, no negative, dont say “give more info” because this is alot of info"
